subject: Re: FW: Fundraiser to take over from 2018-2019
preview: @joel thanks for working through these, much appreciated!! I will close the ticket now. Cheers

full_threads.body: @joel thanks for working through these, much appreciated!! I will close the ticket now. Cheers

Hi Joel,



Fantastic, thank you so much!



Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Sure, confirming that the fundraiser from Dec 12 onward are now published on the site. 

Let me know if this is ok?

Hi Joel,



I believe we still might be missing a few pages from 2018.



As per the below we requested for everyone from the attached list to be transferred and anyone who set up a fundraising page after 12th December.



From looking at the backend I can quickly tell that Kerrie Newton and Galston500 fundraisers and a few other ones are missing. Could you please look into this for us?



Thank you,



Tanja

Hi Joel,



Yes, fantastic - thank you so much!



Cat and myself will be in touch once the first few donations have been made J



Thanks again,



Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Sorry for the confusion here is the breakdown of the site totals and fixed the fundraiser stuff.

There are 23 fundraisers at the moment on 2019 and these fundraisers have no donations yet.
Currently we are showing the total donations from 2018 which is $813,270 (These includes the '21st Annual ECM Charity Dinner', 'Polo day', 'MS Secret Garden Event'). 

I have cleared the server cache in case you are seeing a cached version. 

Does that make sense?

Hi Joel,



I also just noticed that now all the fundraisers are not showing up anymore?



We need the fundraisers transferred over as you've previously done, but their totals can't be included in the website total.



So can we please take over all the fundraisers agreed on with Catherine, not link their totals to the site total and have the current total of the site as the 2018 total until we receive the first few donations.



Please feel free to give me a call if you have any questions.



Thanks so much,



Tanja

Hi Joel,



I am a little confused, can you please confirm what the current site total includes?



Thanks so much,



Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Sure confirming that the site total is now updated.

Hi Joel,



Fantastic, thanks so much!



If we could keep the 2018 total for the moment, that would be wonderful.



Catherine or myself will email you again once we receive the first few donations.



Thanks so much for your help!



Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Happy new year!

Sure, we have reset the total of the site.
Fyi, currently there are no donations on the site starting on Jan 01 2019 so its returning to $0.

Let me know if you want to override the total achieved or stay it as $0?

Hi Joel,



Happy New Year from me also - I hope 2019 has started really well for you!



Looking at the KGTMS website, I've noticed that our current total is $40,845. Does this consist of all funds combined by the fundraising pages we took over into 2019?



Thank you so much for taking over these pages, but their total can't contribute to the overall total on the KGTMS website, as these funds were raised in 2018. We only had to take over their fundraising pages to 2019 because they are still fundraising for us this year, without what was raised so far showing up on the website, does this make sense? Are you please able to reset the total to anything that was raised from 1st January?



Thanks so much for your help!



Kindest regards,



Tanja

Hi Catherine,

Happy new year! 

Sure thing all good now on this one.
https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/fundraiser/kirsty-deen/
https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/fundraiser/kiss-goodbye-to-ms-great-wall-of-china-trek-2019/

Hi Heath,



Hope you had an awesome break.



Thank you so much for actioning the bellow for Tanja and I, much appreciated!



I just noticed that we forgot to include a fundraiser and team page to the list that was sent to you.

https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/fundraiser/kirsty-deen/ and https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/fundraiser/kiss-goodbye-to-ms-great-wall-of-china-trek-2019/



Is there a way for you to make these pages visible on the Kiss website again?

I'm pretty sure Kirsty's page also had funds on it too, but now the amount on her page is zero.



Thank you for your help!



Warmest regards,

Catherine












Catherine Duong

Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7918 • 1300 356 467

cduong@msra.org.au • http://www.msra.org.au/

Hi Tanja, 

Yes, all good, we will action this in Jan! Enjoy your break and speak in 2019!!

Hi Heath,

I hope you're well!

Just following up in regards to my below email, are you ok to action this?

Please also add any fundraising page that was added after 12th December to the attached list and pages that need to be taken over to 2019.

Today is my last day in the office, so please do let me know if you have any questions about this.

Thanks so much,

Tanja


From: Tanja Voss
Sent: Thursday, 13 December 2018 11:24 AM
To: WP Perk Support <support@wpperk.com>
Subject: Fundraiser to take over from 2018-2019


Hi Wolf IQ,

I hope you're all well and it's not too busy in the lead up to Christmas for you guys!

I'm unsure how you guys have done this previously, but Cat and myself have put together a list of fundraising pages that will have to be taken over into the new year, please see attached.

If you can please make sure this happens and of course keep their total fundraising so far but reset the overall total on the KGTMS to zero on 1st January, that would be great.

Do let me know if you have any questions and if this is possible.

Thanks so much,

Tanja
Tanja Voss
Kiss Goodbye to MS Senior Campaign Coordinator
MS Research Australia
